reporter_caption.center: STATE EX REL. CINCINNATI ENQUIRER v. ADCOCK, 106 Ohio St.3d 1495 (2005)

caption.center: STATE EX REL. CINCINNATI ENQUIRER v. ADCOCK.

opinion.opinion_text:
MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS
This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Hamilton County.
IT IS ORDERED by the court, sua sponte, that this case be scheduled for oral argument.
LUNDBERG STRATTON, J., dissents.
RESNICK, J., not participating.Page 1496
